title: Ep72: HMS Warspite in WW2
itunes:title: Ep72: HMS Warspite in WW2
itunes:subtitle: Pete and Gary continue the epic story of HMS Warspite's career in two world wars, as they follow her throughout WW2. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki For more great history content, visit  or...
description:
Pete and Gary continue the epic story of HMS Warspite's career in two world wars, as they follow her throughout WW2.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Pete & Gary's Military History is a Living History production.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
